review: This is device packs a pretty good punch.  I am really very surprised!  As a Prime Member we were given a great deal when it was launching so I really cannot complain.  That said I thought it only fair to also list some of the issues I have had.  THey are not frequent enough for me to want to return it or replace it, but still at times frustrating.  Sometimes it freezes so I have to plug and unplug the device.  Last week I was getting a HDCP unauthorised content message on several of the television shows I tried to watch via my Amazon Fire Stick but problem eventually resolved itself.

review: The Fire TV Stick was very easy to install and once I connected it to my internet service, it's a cinch. This technology opens a whole new world for TV, movie and games for individuals as well as families. I have Netflix as well as Prime accounts, thus it provides an abundance of great animated movies and recently released movies for my two young children and my wife. I highly recommend Fire TV it's an awesome technology!
